Admanthos is the God of Magic. He is rumored be the source of all things
magical, which is why mages are frowned upon and are even outlawed in some
parts of the world. Admanthos can be quite ruthless and seems to be bent on
subjugating the world. He is rumored to own powerful spells that no mortal
could ever learn or control. Many think that magic is the life force of the
planet and by using it admanthos and his followers are slowly killing the
world. Admanthos and his followers are also known for their use of
necromancy, making them Nephiums number one rivals. Selucia also thinks
magic is unnatural so she is also fighting Admanthos and his minions.
Admanthos' followers specialize in necromancy. Most mages are also followers
of Admanthos.
